3: Show me what else you've got!
I'm not going after... after you and Babylonia right now.
I'm not building some Babylonia-ending w-weapon in this facility either.
So... if you stop here, I... I can let you go.
Roland... Did I hear it right? Were you begging for mercy?
(Grabs a handful of gold dust and throws) Are you afraid of this?
Stop with your useless tricks... Accept my proposal and... and go, and I... I promise you I won't send the Corrupted after you.
I think I'll have to turn you down...
I don't buy it. It'll take someone very stupid to buy it if I'm honest.
The way you're acting means that this gold dust is making you desperate...
Maybe the other Ascendants will also be affected by it. So, I'm taking you down this time.
And then I'll pack some of this glitter for your friends before I take down the Ascendants once and for all!
You're not fighting fair. Do all of you Strike Hawks fight this dirty?
If it means removing a big stain on Earth, what's being a little dirty?
